post.body: Tried to dm you. You don't follow me... Hey! :-) Get better. No migraining allowed. Thought I had the same for 3 days. Ugh!
You're so funny!!!
It's beautiful, isn't it?
Pleurisy is SO painful! I had it while pregnant 24 yrs/ago. Our youngest (19now) had it last year. Pain meds will help... rest.
Did call Michele a toady??? Or did I typo a toady? Hmmm...
Look at that gorgeous photo of you, my sweet friend. And btw... we had sleet early this morning, but just gloomy now. Brr...
I can't wait!
Brrrr... is right. I thought I was in CO when the front blew through last night... and sleet! Gosh!
Good choice for toady... though I really liked Women's Intuition too...keep it on your list.
What books are you choosing from?
Oh good. :-) Tree is up here, but presents only partially bought. Going to mingle w/others to find teasures today.
Let's hope you have a wide enough stand so @megandimaria 's adventure doesn't find you.
Get up and hug 'em all Jan! TX style girl ... you know... :-D
@heathertipton @megandimaria @tonyavander Enjoy your evening too.
And could you breath... Comfortably?
Blogging about twittering about blogging. MULTIDEXTEROUS you are!
And atchoooo from me to you :-)
What part of the country is he from? Your character?
@robbieiobst @danicafavorite @boldandfree Cheers! Work hard and laugh a lot :-)
OH MY GOSH!
YAHOOO! Congratulations!!!
Keep, keep, keep the APPLE! :-)
Complicated. They sell dining rooms by the "group" only. They were missing 2 arm chairs from 1 "group." How does that happen?
'Tis the season? I tried to buy a dining room set at one furniture store this weekend and they wouldn't let me either.
@heathertipton What's on the menu?
Nighty nite to you too, FFL!
Happy ironing too :-)
You never know... :-)
That's was my dad's saying when we went to church. He was the preacher, but if we were there, it was a full house :-).
AMEN to that. As you can tell by my last public tweet, I'm in need of slowing down too.
@danicafavorite @michelecushatt I'll be the out-of-state TX liason...it's big state :-)
Mmmm! Jan LOVES you! Fudge, cookies. Yummo yum!
Doesn't sound bad at all. You're opposite of me. Mine is hyper, you are hypo. They need to just speed you up a little bit :-).
What movie are you and Hannah going to watch?
Amen to new GOLDEN friends!
@boldandfree I've still not heard about the fruitcake yet. Was your hunt a success, Megan?
Could never forget all my new and old friends! I am SOOOO blessed with sisters. Love you!
YES! I'm working on my WIP (Christian nonfiction for women, btw), but keep interrupting myself with Twitter and Facebook. Good grief. FOCUS!
Let it snow... let it snow... let is snow... in Houston, TX. It will be short-lived however. Tomorrow's high? 56. Wheww! A heat wave! :-)
It's just plain snowin' here. My daughter called and told me she felt like she was in a Star Wars episode while driving home. Funny!
Okay all y'all. Texans, pay attention! Drive safe. Snow is different from rain :-). No slippery sliding around. Prayers for safety.
Praying for you to recover quickly @sheilawalsh .
Okay, y'all... Was going to go out again, but it's snowing in Southeast TX. Think I'll stay in instead. Sip hot tea and slip under a throw.
Heading out to take Gia to vet. Sweet Lhasa Apso has a bump under her skin that's oozing. To graphic? Sorry. But she's my baby :-).
Follow Life Coach @_nancywilliams for facing holiday stress and replacing it with peace and joy of the season.
On our way to hubby's business Christmas dinner. 'Tis the season... fa la la la la la la la la...
"Good morning, good morning, good morning. It's time to rise and shine." Used to sing this to my kids. Motivating self today :-)
Been gone ALL DAY. Words For The Journey Christmas party, Christmas shopping, and replaced cell battery. Hoping for more than 10 min chats.
Still snowing y'all! And sticking! Who'd a thunk?
Sweet daughter came over to wrap gifts w/me. Brought her crazy dog to play w/Gia. Hubby cooked supper. Memory making moments.
WFTJ gals SETR: follow @michelecushatt @boldandfree @megandimaria @kayday @robbieiobst @danicafavorite RMR GALS.
Rolling table at chirpractor is ahh. Love it... Thinking on to do list for today while I roll.
Getting ready to brave some freezing air for a little Christmas shopping with my daughter. Brrrr... Starbucks will be our first stop.
Brrr... from 78 sweaty degrees yesterday to 43 today. Again, brr... Went for a walk last night in a tank top and jeans. Today? Not a chance.
Whoa! Day starting wayyy too late. Thank the Lord for good friend's phone call.
Careful now...adding jalapeno to fresh, homemade salsa...my recipe...everyone loves it. 'Specially muah. Mmmmm.
I'm really going this time... Really. I am. Going. Now. Buenos Noches! Sweet sleep to all.
Slept through the night... dozed a bit more...Oh Christmas was amazing at this TX home. Beautiful time with family. Oh but I'm full.
Christmas prime rib success! Time to snuggle in...after cleaning kitchen. Splendid day w/family.
Merry Christmas! Love came down...and filled our world. Sweet Jesus...Happy Birthday. We love you!
Christmas Eve celebration a success. Until tomorrow tweethearts...sugar plums dreams...
"Play it by ear Christmas" Kids jobs working until they can work kids no more...Then, let the festivities begin!
Chicken tortilla soup simmering on the stove. Pumpkin pie baked. All is ready for the children f/new tradition. Play it by ear Christmas ...
Off to prepare Christmas. God bless us, EVERY one. And to all a good night...
2lawrencewilson
Wishing I could @ an entire group. I am blessed beyond understanding w/friends and family. Merry Christmas ALL of u. Love y'all!
djhups Oh Jill. thank you so much. Be completely blessed this Christmas (you and yours).
